title: Hideo Kojima Has Officially Left Konami, Although The Company Claims He’s Just On Vacation
text:
Hideo Kojima Has Officially Left Konami, Although The Company Claims He’s Just On Vacation 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Earlier this year, Metal Gear Solid creator Hideo Kojima had a very public falling-out with publisher Konami . Kojima Productions was dissol...
